sources.title: Arch of Triumph (1948)
sources.description: In the winter of 1938, Paris is crowded with refugees from the Nazis, who live in the black shadows of night, trying to evade deportation. One such is Dr. Ravic, who practices medicine illegally and stalks his old Nazi enemy Haake with murder in mind. One rainy night, Ravic meets Joan Madou, a kept woman cast adrift by her lover's sudden death. Against Ravic's better judgment, they become involved in a doomed affair. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/arch-of-triumph-1948/

sources.title: Arch of Triumph (1948) with Ingrid Bergman | The story of an outcast & a killer! by Lewis Milestone
sources.description:
Illegal refugees lead dark lives in pre-World War II Paris, navigating love and survival on the brink of war.

Director: Lewis Milestone
Writers: Lewis Milestone, Harry Brown, Erich Maria Remarque
Stars: Ingrid Bergman, Charles Boyer, Charles Laughton, Louis Calhern
Genres: Drama, Romance, War
Release date: 17 Feb, 1948 (USA)

@CultCinemaClassics

sources.title: Arch of Triumph - Trailer
sources.description: Original Theatrical Trailer for the Lewis Milestone film "Arch of Triumph"

metadata.Plot: In winter of 1938, Paris is crowded with refugees from the Nazis, who live in the black shadows of night, trying to evade deportation. One such is Dr. Ravic, who practices medicine illegally and stalks his old Nazi enemy Haake with murder in mind. One rainy night, Ravic meets Joan Madou, a kept woman cast adrift by her lover's sudden death. Against Ravic's better judgement, they become involved in a doomed affair; matters come to a crisis on the day war is declared.
metadata.Writer: Lewis Milestone, Harry Brown, Erich Maria Remarque
metadata.Actors: Ingrid Bergman, Charles Boyer, Charles Laughton
